memberdef.name: R_NON_W_ALLOC
memberdef.initializer: 0x1 /* Do not allocate Read, Allocate Write */

memberdef.name: R_ALLOC_W_NON
memberdef.initializer: 0x2 /* Allocate Read, Do not allocate Write */

memberdef.name: REGION_RAM_ATTR
memberdef.initializer: {\ .rbar = NOT_EXEC | \ P_RW_U_NA_Msk | NON_SHAREABLE_Msk, /* AP, XN, SH */ \ /* Cache-ability */ \ .mair_idx = MPU_MAIR_INDEX_SRAM, \ .r_limit = REGION_LIMIT_ADDR(base, size), /* Region Limit */ \ }

memberdef.name: REGION_RAM_NOCACHE_ATTR
memberdef.initializer: {\ .rbar = NOT_EXEC | \ P_RW_U_NA_Msk | NON_SHAREABLE_Msk, /* AP, XN, SH */ \ /* Cache-ability */ \ .mair_idx = MPU_MAIR_INDEX_SRAM_NOCACHE, \ .r_limit = REGION_LIMIT_ADDR(base, size), /* Region Limit */ \ }

memberdef.name: REGION_FLASH_ATTR
K_MEM_PARTITION_IS_WRITABLE
memberdef.initializer: ({ \ int __is_writable__; \ switch (attr.rbar & MPU_RBAR_AP_Msk) { \ case P_RW_U_RW_Msk: \ case P_RW_U_NA_Msk: \ __is_writable__ = 1; \ break; \ default: \ __is_writable__ = 0; \ } \ __is_writable__; \ })
